About.title: About me
About.content: I'm a passionate and skilled developer who approaches every project with precision and determination. I have experience in languages like JavaScript, Typescript and C#. Iâ€™ve created various projects like NortBot discord bot, the game Spears on Google Play, and different websites. I also program for individuals. Always learning, always growing.

nortbot.title: NortBot
nortbot.content: NortBot is a versatile Discord bot that offers a variety of features to help you manage your servers and make them more interactive and engaging. This bot provides a wide range of commands, including moderation commands, economy system, 4FUN commands, polls and useful utilities.

spears.title: Spears
spears.content: Spears is a casual tapping game where players throw spears at a spinning circle by tapping the screen, aiming to avoid hitting existing spears. The game features epic levels with varying obstacles and speeds, offering an engaging challenge for players.

badmintonMatch.title: Badminton Match
badmintonMatch.content: Badminton Match is a comprehensive app for tracking and managing badminton matches. It offers score management, player customization, match history, and speech synthesis for point summaries, all wrapped in multi-language support (English, Polish, German).

mystiqo.title: Mystiqo
mystiqo.content: A full-stack app for anonymous chats with strangers, built with TypeScript and React.

northook.title: NortHook
northook.content: NortHook is a straightforward web application for managing Discord Webhooks. It offers an intuitive interface to create, preview, and send webhook messages quickly and efficiently, making Discord integrations simple and accessible.
